column1: Smoque BBQ////Every time I order from there
column2: I'm very satisfied. The ribs are some of the best I've had. The beef brisket is heavenly. The fries are cut fresh and the cole slaw very fresh. I also recommend the corn bread and to top it off
column3: try the peach cobbler. Its delicious! Â I'm lucky this place is one mile from my place.
